subject: Re:    DETAILS OF THE TRANSACTION.
body:
Dear Howard, 

Compliments of the season.

Thanks for your mail which was in response to my proposal to you stating that the central bank is ready to pay the sum of $10.6M which came about as a result of an over invoiced contract. I want you to know that this money would be sent to you in cash through our DIPLOMATIC CASH DELIVERY SYSTEM.

Please know that the reason behind this pattern of payment is to avoid all the problems that are associated with terrorist funding and money laundering activities all over the globe, it would be accompanied by a courier delivery officer to make sure that your funds arrive at your home or given address safe and free.

I want to assure you that if you cooperate with me you can receive the funds within two weeks in your home country, be assured that I have started the process here before contacting you based on that. I will want you to send to me immediately the following information with which we can start the process of the release of the funds to your home country.

1 Your full Names
2. Your full house address
3. A scanned copy of any of the following identities such as, international passport, driver's license or national identification card.
4. Your contact phone numbers,


You will be getting 45% of the total amount of $10.6M, while we the initiators of this deal would take 50% of the money, the remaining 5% would be for expenses that you and I would make in the cause of the transaction.

Once more I assure you that this transaction is 100% risk and hitch free and your personal information cannot be used for anything else outside what i have told you. If you cooperate with me in less than two weeks all the approvals would have been received and the funds on its way to your home country.

I wait for your details .Do have a blessed week ahead of you with your family.
Regards,
Mr Mohammed Ouedraogo
Tel: +234-916-954-4809

subject: Re:    Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Good day Howard,
Greetings to you and your family with hope you are all doing great over there,
I have been waiting to receive you from your details with which we can put up claims for the $10.6M but until now no news from you hence i decided to remind you again.
I want you to know that time is very important to this transaction while i look forward to hearing from you soonest.
Regards,Mohammed.
